text: Ivana Trump (born Ivana Marie Zelníčková; (); February 20, 1949 - July 14, 2022) was a Czech-American businesswoman and model. She was best known for her marriage to Donald Trump, which ended in divorce. They had three children together, Donald Trump Jr, Ivanka Trump, and Eric Trump. In 2010, she was a contestant in the British version of Celebrity Big Brother. == Death == Trump died on July 14, 2022 in her Manhattan, New York City home at the age of 73. The next day, it was revealed that Trump died of "blunt impact injuries to the torso" after falling on her staircase. She was buried at the Trump National Golf Club Bedminster in Bedminster, New Jersey. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Czech businesspeople Category:Celebrity Big Brother contestants Category:Trump family Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Sportspeople from New York City Category:Television personalities from New York City Category:Olympians for Czechoslovakia Category:American skiers Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
title: Ivana Trump
